definition: to make an investigative visit/to go and find out from the source
short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident
to visit/to call on/to seek/to inquire/to investigate

sentences.english: The investigation and inuquiry into the whereabouts of the art treasures took years of work.
sentences.chinese: 察訪這些珍貴藝術品的下落花費了多年的時間。
